description: Borrowed from French fondue (“melted”), from fondre (“to melt”).

entries.meaning: A dish made of melted cheese, chocolate etc., or of a boiling liquid into which food can be dipped.

verbs.description: fondue (third-person singular simple present fondues, present participle fonduing or fondueing, simple past and past participle fondued)

entries.meaning: To prepare or serve as a fondue.
